channel.title: The system cannot find the path specified
channel.description: Well..I tried to do my own private server for a first time, and I got error in compiler (The system cannot find the path specified, press any key to continue) And i'm quite sure, that i made everything right..Any help ?

item.title: The system cannot find the path specified
item.dc:creator: @CrazyHmm CrazyHmm
item.description:
@CrazyHmm wrote:

Ok Thanks alot !

Read full topic
item.source: The system cannot find the path specified

item.title: The system cannot find the path specified
item.dc:creator: @supamagier supamagier
item.description:
@supamagier wrote:

it says note, can’t you see?

Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.

It means that your program is using outdated methods.

Read full topic
item.source: The system cannot find the path specified

item.title: The system cannot find the path specified
item.dc:creator: @Scarecrows Scarecrows
item.description:
@Scarecrows wrote:

That is not an error, it worked.

Read full topic
item.source: The system cannot find the path specified

item.title: The system cannot find the path specified
item.dc:creator: @CrazyHmm CrazyHmm
item.description:
@CrazyHmm wrote:

You mean…

@echo off title SQLScape Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac" *java pause

to that ?

@echo off title SQLScape Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac" *java pause

If i do that, i’ll get another error…

Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic
item.source: The system cannot find the path specified

item.title: The system cannot find the path specified
item.dc:creator: @MoparScaperDude MoparScaperDude
item.description:
@MoparScaperDude wrote:

Edit the compiler with bat, change the JDK path to your current one.

Find the current one at:

C Drive --> Program Files --> Java

Read full topic
